Action.author: andrey.goncharov
Action.body: The work is done in feature/indy-399 branches in indy-node, indy-anoncreds, indy-plenum, sovrin-packaging, jenkins-shared repos. Merge is blocked by pending patches to client to make it compatible with the latest anoncreds. They will be providedÂ by gabriel team shortly.

Action.body: indy-node python3-plenum -> indy-plenum python3-anoncreds -> indy-anoncreds A new package was added: sovrin >
